frontmatter.title: Game of Lives
frontmatter.description: A story-telling VR game inspired by the best “walking simulators” that will challenge you to see the world from other people’s eyes. Winner of the first Isobar International Hackathon.
frontmatter.minibio: A Virtual Reality game that aims to foster empathy for social issues.

frontmatter.title: VTEX Home
frontmatter.description: A new home for the an e-commerce platform admin, setting the ground for a new generation of Admin UIs.
frontmatter.minibio: A new home dashboard for an ecommerce platfom.
